code: @Override public void start(File tmpDataFolder, String clusterName) throws Exception {     if (node == null) {         node = NodeBuilder.nodeBuilder().settings(Settings.settingsBuilder().put("path.home", tmpDataFolder.getParent()).put("http.enabled", false).put("path.data", tmpDataFolder.getAbsolutePath())).clusterName(clusterName).node().         node.start().     } }
@Override public void close() throws Exception {     if (node != null && !node.isClosed()) {         node.close().         node = null.     } }
@Override public Client getClient() {     if (node != null && !node.isClosed()) {         return node.client().     } else {         return null.     } }
